I asked about who might have gone to the area, but aside from some middle-

JONATHAN SIMS 
Statement ends. 
He didn’t, in the end. Lose Ethan, that is. Ethan North is currently a healthy 
eleven-year-old boy living with a loving foster family in Inverness. They 
declined to give an interview. I can’t say I blame them. The rest is a standard 
muddle – Tim couldn’t find evidence of the clearing, Sasha established all the

accidents that befell Mr. North and his loved ones appeared mundane in 
nature. The set-up of the clearing matches rituals or spells in both voodoo and 
Wicca but nothing definitive and there is no hard evidence of anything 
supernatural occurring. 
There’s no reason to believe that when Jason North doused himself in petrol 
on August the 10th 2009, then lit himself on fire, he was doing anything other 
than acting out the delusions of a paranoid alcoholic. Paramedics took him to 
Raigmore Hospital, where he died three days later. He never regained 
consciousness.
